item.title: What Is Ticket in RepairRabbit?
item.description: Tickets The main organ of a repair shop is its ticketing system. Repair ticket is a job sheet, the tickets will show you exactly what you need, when you need it, from any device. The lightweight workflow will gently remind you of the next task without getting in your way or slowing you down. Maintaining a record of repair tickets can be helpful in the future. You can check daily, weekly & monthly repair tickets easily.
